title: Diamond as Big as the Ritz - response to remarks

content.question: John’s response to the remarks made by his schoolmates’ fathers in the final paragraph most strongly suggests that he

choices.label: desires to maintain a polite demeanor
is embarrassed about his unfashionable hometown
dislikes spending his summers visiting his schoolmates
takes solace in making private jokes at the fathers’ expense

content.answer: desires to maintain a polite demeanor

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify and describe what specific textual details reveal about a character, that character's perspective, and that character's motives.
